msg: initial spike for CAMEL-817 which shows how to create a CamelContext and wire in some RouteBuilder instances, optionally using a RouteBuilder as a builder of other route builders

author: jacopoc
msg: Improved template decorator resource: now it searches for the htmlHead/header/footer sub contents associated to the Content that is going to be decorated before using (if they are not found) the ones associated to the Content record of the decorator.
